Note: I have kept all three entities as they all refer to different medical conditions or symptoms. "Paranoid symptomatology" refers to a pattern of behavior characterized by suspiciousness and mistrust, "depressive symptoms" refer to symptoms related to depression such as sadness, and "psychotic symptoms" refer to symptoms of psychosis such as hallucinations.
